title: Approve Contact Request
description: Approve Contact Request. This operation is used to approve profile request.

contactRequestId.description: The ID of the Contact Request.

approverComments.description: Approver comments during approval of request, these are optional.

approvedSource.description: Approver source of channel during approval of request. This is optional. If value not sent via payload, system auto populates this property value with Delegated Administrator.
